content: अवेक्षणं {@--1@} Looking towards or at, seeing. {@--2@} Guarding, watching over, protection, taking care of, attending to, supervision, inspection; वर्णाश्रमावेक्षणजागरूकः <ls>R. 14. 85</ls>; हस्त्यश्वावेक्षणेऽनाभियुक्तः <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Attention, care, observation. {@--4@} Regarding, considering; see अनवेक्षणं.
